Room.Name: Golgoth Mountain Path
Room.ShortDescription: You continue walking along the western side of the mountain.
Room.LongDescription: The trail is a soft earth and easily imprinted, but even so, whatever made the footprints you see must be very heavy. A short distance along the path the footprints lead away from it. Although man-sized, the markings indicate that the creature which made them has only two large toes. If you look in the direction of the tracks you see the entrance to a cave which was previously obscured by trees.
